sentences.sContent: Geoff didn’t study law. Instead, he decided to become an actor.
sentences.sCn: 杰夫没学法律，相反，他决定当演员。

sentences.sContent: If Jo can’t attend the meeting, I could go instead.
sentences.sCn: 如果乔不能去开会，我可以代他去。

trans.tranCn: 代替， 顶替， 作为替代； 反而， 却
trans.tranOther: used to say what is done, when you have just said that a particular thing is not done
